Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. Integer semper velit vel leo rutrum sed fermentum elit porta.

All car manufacture companies release their products fuel efficiency in scale of MPG or Liter per 100Km, but those numbers are actually just an estimates or the ideal numbers that could be achieved only under some certain conditions such as good quality fuel, brand new tires without any attrition and erosion, flat road, and without any passengers, but not all of us have all those perfect parameters ! so it would be nice to have a better understanding of our automobile fuel consuming to see if ours is the green one or not.

Please note that the distance is calculated based on the average of MPG and the distance you can go could be affected and altered by your speed, traffic jam, road slob, wind speed, number of passengers, tire pressure, air conditioner etc …

Please note that the distance is calculated based on the average of Litter per 100Km and the distance you can go could be affected and altered by your speed, traffic jam, road slob, wind speed, number of passengers, tire pressure, air conditioner etc …

1- Full the gas tank at the gas station.
2- Reset the odometer(trip) number.
3- Next time at the gas station note down the odometer number line. 4- Full the gas tank and note down the amount of Gallon or Litter. 5- Now you have all the numbers you need to calculate the accurate fuel efficiency of your car.
you can save MPG or Liter/100Km to also calculate the distance you can drive !
